<link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/is-the-ozone-layer-getting-better</link>     <description>Scientists believe the hole in the ozone layer might have stopped growing.</description>     <dc:date>2014-09-11T13:35:10Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/could-smart-umbrellas-improve-weather-forecasts">     <title>Could smart umbrellas improve weather forecasts?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/could-smart-umbrellas-improve-weather-forecasts</link>     <description>Brollies kitted out with sensors could help to replace expensive equipment.</description>     <dc:date>2014-05-01T13:32:43Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/the-real-alien-invaders">     <title>The real alien invaders</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/the-real-alien-invaders</link>     <description>Grey squirrels, killer shrimps and poisonous plants are amongst a number of \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdnon-native\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd species threatening the UK.</description>     <dc:date>2014-04-17T12:58:03Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/career-profile-meteorologist">     <title>Career profile: Meteorologist</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/career-profile-meteorologist</link>     <description>Meteorologists study the Earth's atmosphere to understand and predict climate and weather.</description>     <dc:date>2014-01-29T18:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/why-is-north-america-in-deep-freeze-1">     <title>Why is North America in deep freeze?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/why-is-north-america-in-deep-freeze-1</link>     <description>Heavy snowfall and record temperatures as low as -26C are affecting parts of Canada and the USA. Find out why.</description>     <dc:date>2014-01-07T15:33:18Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/getting-into-business-with-geography">     <title>Getting into business with geography</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/getting-into-business-with-geography</link>     <description>Businesses around the world recognize how useful geographers can be. Find out how your geography skills can help make money.</description>     <dc:date>2013-11-26T14:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/career-profile-town-planner">     <title>Career profile: Town Planner</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/career-profile-town-planner</link>     <description>When hundreds of thousands of people live in a city, someone has to work out where to put everything. That\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds the job of town planners.</description>     <dc:date>2013-09-30T12:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/which-are-the-world2019s-best-cities-to-live-in">     <title>Which are the world\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds best cities to live in?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/which-are-the-world2019s-best-cities-to-live-in</link>     <description>Melbourne has the top quality of life of the world\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds biggest cities.</description>     <dc:date>2013-08-30T13:37:02Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/studying-geography/studying-geology">     <title>Studying geology</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/studying-geography/studying-geology</link>     <description>Geologists know how the world works inside and out. Find out where geology could take you.</description>     <dc:date>2013-08-13T14:55:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/how-could-cacti-help-to-clean-up-oil-spills">     <title>How could cacti help to clean up oil spills?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/how-could-cacti-help-to-clean-up-oil-spills</link>     <description>Scientists have developed a process based on the way the plants extract water from the air.</description>     <dc:date>2013-08-08T14:13:20Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/working-for-ordnance-survey">     <title>Working for Ordnance Survey</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/working-for-ordnance-survey</link>     <description>Ordnance Survey is one of the world\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds biggest mapping companies and is Great Britain\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds national mapping agency. Find out about working for them here.</description>     <dc:date>2013-07-23T08:45:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/features-and-resources/solar-powered-plane-sets-new-record">     <title>Solar-powered plane sets new record</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/features-and-resources/solar-powered-plane-sets-new-record</link>     <description>A flight of 1,541 kilometres is the longest ever achieved in a solar-powered plane.</description>     <dc:date>2013-05-28T16:13:29Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/should-we-be-eating-more-insects">     <title>Should we be eating more insects?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/should-we-be-eating-more-insects</link>     <description>A United Nations report says that eating more insects would help to prevent hunger and save the environment.</description>     <dc:date>2013-05-14T15:21:36Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/do-parks-make-you-happy">     <title>Do parks make you happy?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/do-parks-make-you-happy</link>     <description>People who live near green space in towns and cities are more satisfied in life.</description>     <dc:date>2013-04-22T13:47:43Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/studying-geography/geography-ba-or-bsc">     <title>Geography: BA or BSc?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/studying-geography/geography-ba-or-bsc</link>     <description>Geography is one of the few subjects often offered as both a BA and a BSc - so what's the difference?</description>     <dc:date>2013-04-08T15:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/career-profile-environmental-health-practitioner">     <title>Career profile: Environmental health practitioner</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/career-profile-environmental-health-practitioner</link>     <description>Environmental health practitioners tackle a huge range of environmental issues to keep people healthy and safe.</description>     <dc:date>2013-03-25T16:50:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/studying-geography/studying-an-agriculture-degree">     <title>Studying an agriculture degree</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/studying-geography/studying-an-agriculture-degree</link>     <description>Farming combines big business with hard science to feed us all. Find out how an agriculture degree can get you into this vital industry.</description>     <dc:date>2013-02-21T17:30:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/environmental-volunteering">     <title>Environmental volunteering</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/environmental-volunteering</link>     <description>Find out about some of the opportunities available for volunteers who want to help the environment.</description>     <dc:date>2013-02-07T17:15:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/studying-geography/environmental-apprenticeships">     <title>Environmental apprenticeships</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/studying-geography/environmental-apprenticeships</link>     <description>Lots of apprenticeships have an environmental element. Find out about three of the most relevant for those looking for a green career.</description>     <dc:date>2013-01-28T16:35:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/working-in-transport-management">     <title>Working in transport management</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/careers-in-geography-and-environment/working-in-transport-management</link>     <description>Whether it's by road, rail, air or sea, a transport network is a difficult thing to run. Find out how you can keep things moving.</description>     <dc:date>2013-01-24T15:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/strange-things-from-the-sea">     <title>Strange things from the sea</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/strange-things-from-the-sea</link>     <description>On opposite sides of the world, unusual finds have washed up on rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/how-a-new-island-can-rise-out-of-the-sea">     <title>How a new island can rise out of the sea</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/how-a-new-island-can-rise-out-of-the-sea</link>     <description>A new island has appeared off the coast of Germany, and rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/studying-geography/five-unusual-geography-courses">     <title>Five unusual geography courses</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/studying-geography/five-unusual-geography-courses</link>     <description>Most universities offer plain geography degrees, rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/how-maori-ovens-can-reveal-the-earths-magnetic-past">     <title>How Maori ovens can reveal the Earth's magnetic past</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/how-maori-ovens-can-reveal-the-earths-magnetic-past</link>     <description>Studying the stones that line <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/studying-geography/studying-town-planning</link>     <description>The right degree could see you designing the cities of the future. Find out more about town planning courses.</description>     <dc:date>2012-12-03T15:10:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/will-bananas-be-the-new-potatoes">     <title>Will bananas be the new potatoes?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/geography-and-environment/will-bananas-be-the-new-potatoes</link>     <description>Global warming could change the way people eat.</description>     <dc:date>2012-11-05T13:04:05Z</dc:date>   </item> </rdf:RDF>
